TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted: You enjoy them until the radiation sickness takes you.

I wish for a universal coin.

Granted. You get a universal penny

 

I wish for ksp2 to not have been cancelled

Granted, it isn't. It's 2048, and the people are still waiting for it.
 

4 hours ago, ColdJ said:

I wish for a universal coin.

Granted, too. Since the Earth occupation by the Intergalactic Council of the Universe, all underdeveloped races of the Universe must use the Universal Penny to track their payments.


I wish for liquid money in flasks and bottles.

Some rich guy breaks in your house, steals your liquid money reserves and drinks it all.

I wish for ideas.

Granted: Some ikea flat packs.

I wish the LEGO guy came back.
